lines.text: "Next thing you know, you'll tell us we really speak japanese!"
No, that's the name of our band.

The evil Kilokahn lives inside computer circuits. With the help of Malcom Frink he creates megavirus monsters to attack electronic systems. Meanwhile a freak accident turns Sam Collins into Servo. His friends join forces in their sammuraized attack vehicles. Together they transform into the Superhuman Sammurai Syber Squad.
